Encounter.Name: Gladiator Night - Round 1, Fight 2
Encounter.Notes: This is the second fight, Borbig Drob the Houk VS. W'Jilee the Whipid. [P] These are two bruisers with high strength, the focus on the match should be who the strongest of the two compeditors are. If one of your PC's is a someone who focused on strength and wishes to compete, simply swap out one of the compeditors for them and see if they really are the strongest fighter around. [P] The winner will proceed to round 2, use these encounters as a template to make round 2, and round 3 (the finals).
